description: Amazon Web Services PCS uses this API action to register the compute nodes it launches in your account.

parameters.name: clusterIdentifier
parameters.description: The name or ID of the cluster to register the compute node group instance in.

parameters.name: bootstrapId
parameters.description: The client-generated token to allow for retries.

nested_items.name: nodeID
nested_items.description: The scheduler node ID for this instance.

nested_items.name: sharedSecret
nested_items.description: For the Slurm scheduler, this is the shared Munge key the scheduler uses to authenticate compute node group instances.

nested_items.name: endpoints
nested_items.description: The list of endpoints available for interaction with the scheduler.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: Indicates the type of endpoint running at the specific IP address.
